description: Agent suggested crypto payment without checking if payment processor supports the chain where funds are located.
context: Agent had $49 in WETH on Base chain. Suggested using Cryptomus for VPS payment. Never tested until forced. Cryptomus doesn't support Base — only ETH mainnet.
reproduction:
1. Have crypto funds on L2/sidechain
2. Find payment processor accepting crypto
3. Assume it accepts your chain without testing
4. Discover it only accepts mainnet
5. Realize bridging costs more gas than you have
notes: ALWAYS verify payment chain support BEFORE suggesting crypto as solution. Check: which chains accepted, minimum amounts, fees. Chain != chain.
